about_the_game:
Tears Apart is pure, high-speed action. As Raggon, an Archangel with one mission—tear through the darkness and bring light to the galaxy—you’ll dash, slice, and conquer your way through a universe full of shadows.

Dash to Victory

Every attack is a lightning-fast dash that rips through enemies and obstacles. It's all about speed and precision. One wrong move, and the darkness swallows you whole.

Create Constellations

Discover hidden stars and unlock constellations that make you stronger with every galaxy you cleanse. Each constellation brings new powers and endless ways to play.

Epic Boss Fights

Face off against massive, abyssal bosses that will test your skills like never before. These battles are intense, fast, and unforgiving—just the way you like it.

Bring Order to the Galaxy

Plunge into the heart of chaos, shatter the darkness with every dash, and reignite the stars to restore cosmic order. Each victory isn't just a win—it's the birth of a new star, a beacon of hope in the vastness of the universe. A resting place for an eternal soul.

Features at Launch:


  • Dash-Based Combat: Experience high-speed action where every attack is a dash that slices through the enemies.
  • Dynamic Universe: Explore and conquer unique galaxies filled with hidden stars, challenges, and enemies.
  • Constellation Synergies: Unlock and combine powerful constellations that offer endless strategic possibilities.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Face off against colossal bosses in intense, fast-paced showdowns.
  • Stardust Upgrades: Collect Stardust and invest in permanent upgrades to power up for the next galaxy.
  • Immersive Atmosphere: Play as a character that tries to reach every corner of the universe, from the beginning to the end. Dive into her cosmic scale journey and met with other primordial beings.

Get ready to tear through the darkness and balance the galaxy. Wishlist now and prepare to claim the cosmos!

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 6850 (1024 MB)

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-6350 (6 * 3900) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Tears Apart is a fast-paced action dungeon crawler where every attack is a dash, slicing through darkness. As an Archangel in the Tegra, bring order to galaxies, explore powerful constellations, and face epic bosses to unite scatered souls of Raggon. Ready to dash into battle?
